values: Maturity in Christ (4): The Maturity of ChristMaturity in Christ (4): The Maturity of Christ

Pastor Steve Jeffery explores how our pursuit of maturity in Christ is grounded on the maturity that Christ himself has, and which he has bestowed on us as a gift by the Spirit. Visit our website — allsaintskirk.com Worship with us — Sundays 11:00 AM
